entry.title: Monday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 13 this morning then rising.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 13 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
